output.name: EmeraldCanopyRoot
output.description: Emerald Canopy Root is the leading end-to-end reforestation company in the U.S., focused on making reforestation scalable to combat the impact of wildfires. They offer innovative, no-cost forest restoration services to landowners by removing traditional barriers such as financial and procedural hurdles. As the largest seed bank and reforestation container stock producer in the Western U.S., Root is pioneering advancements in the non-timber forestry supply chain, ensuring sustainable management of forest resources.

suboptimal.actual: Emerald Canopy Root is the leading end-to-end reforestation company in the U.S., focused on making reforestation scalable to combat the impact of wildfires. They offer innovative, no-cost forest restoration services to landowners by removing traditional barriers such as financial and procedural hurdles. As the largest seed bank and reforestation container stock producer in the Western U.S., Root is pioneering advancements in the non-timber forestry supply chain, ensuring sustainable management of forest resources.
suboptimal.ground: The leading end-to-end reforestation company in the USA, on a mission to make reforestation scalable. We are the only vertically-integrated reforestation company in the industry and are the largest seed bank and reforestation container stock producer in the Western USA. We are also an innovation center for the non-timber forestry supply chain, developing various biological and technical products for achieving land management goals more efficiently
